document_data.mainbody:
erifar was a dragonborn of Abeir, a descendant of Shasphur, and an ancestor of Clan Kepeshkmolik.
Nerifar was the direct ancestor of Kepeshkmolik Thymara.
Nerifar was one of the dragonborn clan leaders who took part in the battle of the Crippled Mountain. While Iskdara, Shurideh, Reshvemi, and Thuchir infiltrated the Celestial Mountain to kill Rhodrolytharnestrix, Nerifar was one of the clan leaders who led the dragonborn rebels against Rhodrolytharnestrixs dragon army.
Nerifar survived the final battle and was one of the founders of Tymanchebar, and presumably, he was the first patriarch of Clan Kepeshkmolik.
